explains: n. 缺乏，不足；缺陷，瑕疵；赤字
wordGroup: iron deficiency anemia 缺铁性贫血
mental deficiency 心智缺陷；智力缺陷；精神不健全
acquired immune deficiency syndrome 艾滋病；获得性免疫缺陷综合症
nutrient deficiency 营养不足；养分缺乏
vitamin deficiency 维生素缺乏；维生素缺乏症

sentences.en: Vitamin deficiency in the diet can cause illness.
sentences.cn: 饮食中缺乏维生素可能导致疾病。

sentences.en: They did blood tests on him for signs of vitamin deficiency.
sentences.cn: 他们给他做了血检看是否有缺乏维生素的迹象。

sentences.en: Opacity of the eye lens can be induced by deficiency of certain vitamins.
sentences.cn: 眼球晶状体的混浊可由缺乏某些维生素引起。
